subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: The latest proposal, which came after two weeks of silence between the N.H.L. and the players’ association, could reflect an effort to settle the lockout and save the season.
snippet: The latest proposal, which came after two weeks of silence between the N.H.L. and the players’ association, could reflect an effort to settle the lockout and save the season.
